markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Runic Impression](/Feats.aspx?ID=2865) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 46 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
focus pool

</column>

---

You can temporarily replicate the effects of a property rune for your weapon or unarmed attacks. You learn the [_runic impression_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1040) conflux spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Runic Impression
